A_TO_X
DATA_TO_Y
SUB
FLAGS
Z_TO_DATA
H_TO_DATA
L_TO_DATA
DATA_TO_A;0b00100000000
DATA_TO_B;0b01000000000
DATA_TO_C;0b01100000000
DATA_TO_D;0b10000000000
DATA_TO_MDR;0b10100000000
DATA_TO_ADDR_HI;0b11000000000
DATA_TO_ADDR_LO;0b11100000000
A_TO_DATA;0b00100000000000
B_TO_DATA;0b01000000000000
C_TO_DATA;0b01100000000000
D_TO_DATA;0b10000000000000
MDR_TO_DATA;0b10100000000000
ADDR_HI_TO_DATA;0b11000000000000
ADDR_LO_TO_DATA;0b11100000000000
ADDR_TO_IP;0b00100000000000000
ADDR_TO_HL;0b01000000000000000
ADDR_TO_T;0b01100000000000000
ADDR_TO_SP;0b10000000000000000
MAR_INC;0b10100000000000000
ADDR_TO_MAR;0b11000000000000000
DATA_TO_IR;0b11100000000000000
IP_TO_ADDR;0b00100000000000000000
HL_TO_ADDR;0b01000000000000000000
T_TO_ADDR;0b01100000000000000000
SP_TO_ADDR;0b10000000000000000000
IP_INC;0b10100000000000000000
HLT;0b11000000000000000000
